column4: shortly you'll receive an email with instructions to change your password
remember to check your spam folder

With the FREE plan you don't have to pay anything to use PostCanal.com.

Whenever you feel confortable you can upgrade anytime to a different subscription.
Shortly you'll receive an email with a link to confirm you subscription. After this, you're ready to start using PostCanal.com.
Remember to check your spam folder.
Check your inbox to validate your new email
email change accepted. check your new email inbox.
check your email address for password recovery
